entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:49 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain or snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain or periods of snow early in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
